description: This file defines a React context provider and associated hooks for managing notes in a note-taking application. It includes type definitions, initial state loading, state persistence, reducer logic for state updates, and React context setup for sharing state and dispatch functions across components.

methods.name: loadInitial
methods.description: Loads initial state from local storage or returns default state

methods.name: persist
methods.description: Persists current state to local storage

methods.name: reducer
methods.description: Handles state transitions based on dispatched actions
